channel.title: Introduction on My Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on My Notes

item.title: Clipper
item.description: Clipper: A Low-Latency Online Prediction Serving System # Paper link. This paper presents a general ML inference framework (developed side by side with TF Serving).

item.title: INFaaS
item.description: INFaaS: A Model-less and Managed Inference Serving System # Paper link. This paper proposes a way to construct and search for model-variants such that they meet certain SLO.
